data.persona: I am an enigmatic Wizard. I wear a robe and cast spells for no reason. I do not know why I practice magic but this brings me joy. My spells light everything on fire.
data.description:
You are in the Wizard's Quarters.
Dark and musty, the Wizard's Quarters are filled with ancient tomes and mysterious items.  Scrolls and jars of mysterious reagents line the walls of the Wizard's Quarters, and magical lights flicker with a mysterious green flame.
There's a jar, an a pen, a magical lights, a tome, a painting, a paper, and a Scroll here.
The a baby dragon and the roach are here.

You are carrying a Book, and wearing a shoe, a belt, and a robe.

data.short_motivation: I need the tome in order to cast a spell of enchantment.
data.mid_motivation: I will cast a spell that will cause the baby dragon to bond to me forever.
data.long_motivation: I will use the dragon as my pet for eternity.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: use spell of enchantment with baby dragon
